thread.title: BRIEF-Nexstim Oyj : Key Technology Patent Granted for US
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Nexstim Oyj : Key Technology Patent Granted for US | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Nexstim Oyj : Key Technology Patent Granted for US
text:
Aug 11 Nexstim Oyj :
* United States Patent and Trademark Office ("USPTO") has now granted a key patent covering its method and system for displaying the electric field generated on the brain by transcranial magnetic stimulation (TMS) Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
